functionDecorators.name: multiTransferToken_a4A
functionDecorators.description: Send ERC20 tokens to multiple addresses using two arrays which includes the address and the amount.

parameterDecorators.name: _addresses
parameterDecorators.description: Array of addresses to send to.

parameterDecorators.name: _amounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array of token amounts to send.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.
